mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rn, TMP.* from( SELECT m.meeting_no, m.meeting_name, m.meeting_location, m.club_no, m.meeting_date, m.MEETING_DATE - SYSDATE as dday, c.CLUB_NAME, a.attach_no FROM meeting m JOIN club c ON m.CLUB_NO = c.CLUB_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEETING_IMAGE mi ON m.MEETING_NO = mi.MEETING_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH a ON mi.ATTACH_NO = a.ATTACH_NO WHERE m.club_NO IN (SELECT c.CLUB_NO FROM MEMBER m JOIN club_member cm ON m.MEMBER_ID =cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID JOIN CLUB c ON cm.CLUB_NO = c.CLUB_NO WHERE m.member_id= #{memberId}) order by case when dday > 0 then 1 else 0 end desc, dday asc )TMP ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{finishRow}

select mm.meeting_no, mm.club_member_no, cm.club_member_id, mf.attach_no from meeting_member mm join club_member cm on mm.club_member_no = cm.club_member_no left outer join member_profile mf on mf.member_id = cm.club_member_id order by mm.meeting_no
select * from meeting_member where meeting_no = #{meetingNo} and club_member_no = #{clubMemberNo}

SELECT count(*) from meeting m JOIN club c ON m.CLUB_NO = c.CLUB_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEETING_IMAGE mi ON m.MEETING_NO = mi.MEETING_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH a ON mi.ATTACH_NO = a.ATTACH_NO WHERE m.club_NO IN (SELECT c.CLUB_NO FROM MEMBER m JOIN club_member cm ON m.MEMBER_ID =cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID JOIN CLUB c ON cm.CLUB_NO = c.CLUB_NO WHERE m.member_id= #{memberId})
